Class NetflowUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • netflow.NetflowUtils

  • public class NetflowUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    NetflowUtils class. Contains static methods that may be used for operations in netflow files (.csv).

    • Method Detail

      • loadNetflowCsv

        public static java.util.ArrayList<org.apache.kafka.connect.source.SourceRecord> loadNetflowCsv(java.lang.String csvFile,
                                                                                               java.lang.String KAFKA_TOPIC,
                                                                                               java.lang.String keyPrefix)
        Create a Kafka SourceRecord for each record in a .csv file. Returns an Arraylist with these SourceRecords.
        Parameters:
        csvFile - String Filename of .csv to be parsed.
        KAFKA_TOPIC - String Kafka topic that SourceRecord will be sent.
        keyPrefix - String A prefix for each record's key. Keys are prefix plus a counter. prefix is [collectorId]_[filename]_[counter].
        Returns:
        ArrayList(SourceRecord) A list, which contains all created SourceRecords.

      • createSourceRecord

        private static org.apache.kafka.connect.source.SourceRecord createSourceRecord(java.lang.String KAFKA_TOPIC,
                                                                               java.lang.String key,
                                                                               java.lang.String value)
        Create a SourceRecord from a .csv line. Set STRING_SCHEMA for both key and value serializers and deserializers.
        Parameters:
        KAFKA_TOPIC - String Kafka topic to be sent.
        key - String Key for this record in Kafka.
        value - String Value of this record in Kafka.
        Returns:
        SourceRecord A SourceRecord object to be sent in Kafka.
